content:
Stuart has demonstrated a keen understanding of expanding brackets and is able to confidently apply this skill to a range of mathematical problems. He has consistently achieved high scores in this area and demonstrates a solid grasp of the underlying principles.

In order to continue his academic progress, Stuart should focus on improving his understanding of area and perimeter. This will enable him to apply mathematical principles to a wider range of problems, as well as developing his problem-solving skills. With continued effort and focus, there is no doubt that Stuart will continue to excel in mathematics and achieve his academic goals.
